name: Diamond Run
description:
In the Enchanted Mines, the gems hum a magical lullaby. The greatest of these is the Siren Diamond with a song so sweet that it was said to bring emperors to their knees. So much power did the diamond hold that, when discovered, it was abandoned in the darkest and deepest part of the Enchanted Mines so only the faintest echo of it could reach the surface. The ancient miners thought to guard the Siren Diamond and they were successful…until now.

You, Idaho Jones, archeologist and adventure extraordinaire, have finally found it after years of searching. A great museum back home is eager to study its mysterious power, but you must survive the Enchanted Mines first! Upon touching the Siren Diamond, the ancient protections left behind by the miners were set off.

Using your wit and quick reflexes, escape the twisting, crumbling mines and booby traps before it is too late! Fly through the abandoned Enchanted Mines using every resource available to you. Keep an eye open for treasures among the rubble to buy the latest technology for an extra edge. How far can you escape before the Enchanted Mines take back what is theirs?
